post.body: Let me guess...one of them was thrown out of his own endzone?
Yes, and most troublesome when things run short.
Lighten up, big fella. There is a greater provision than money. I feel confident you are doing that.
RW now has the opportunity to realize he is being used, but utilize the publicity wisely anyway.
Better make it both. : )
no, is Darrel Royal still at Texas?
Nutt's bowl record with Ark was 2-5. He is a used car salesman. Leach's record is much better; just not today.
You have no knowledge of that which you speak. Nutt's best year is always his first.
I love it!
I am at the game in Fayetteville.
You are not offending me. Romo is a joke.
I was ready to dispense some serious doses of SleepAid
That is almost 7 years @ 4 hours a day (practice time)
That explains my talent for sarcasm.
That list left off "A Charlie Brown Christmas." How can you do that?
Trip to in-laws concludes. Heart rate returns to normal.
Anger growing...eyes glowing red....flesh turning green...clothes ripping....AAARRGGHHHH!!!!
Short trip to in-laws growing longer as talk of a 3 TD victory by OU in the BCS title game is pushing me to the brink.
Christmas with the in-laws today. A quick excursion to and from Sapulpa.
Uh-oh, Andy's doing something new... http://thepivotfoot.blogspot.com.
Knocking out the rest of my Christmas shopping on a foggy Oklahoma morning. Patience Andy, patience.
Going to bed early. Going to finish reading Wild Goose Chase and then count a few sheep.
Sorry @dscottp and @bobmayfield I bought my wife a big screen TV for her British movies, so get to the back of the line.
About to go entertain the staff of Quail Springs Baptist Church. I'm a little nervous, so prayers please. : )
Sitting in the Yukon DPS waiting for my son to take his DL test...room temp: 42 degrees.
My pessimistic strategy has vaulted the Cowboys to victory.
Giants will score with 18 seconds left in the game to win. Sit back and enjoy gentlemen.
Collapse taking shape...hope fading...lights dimming
Hatfield hasn't been the coach for 19 years. Hey Bob, it's 2008.
Looking forward to the "iamnot" Winter Retreat with FBC Moore.
Hoga win!!!!!
Hogs about to beat OU in basketball!
Got to preach at FBC Holdenville today. Good times with good people.
Hosting 7 sophomore guys at my house. I was their 9th grade SS teacher. I love these guys!
Chose the wrong line again at WalMart...it's a gift.
OG&E meter is spinning like a Russian Ice Skater as every outlet in the house has some gizmo or charger for a gizmo hooked up to it.
After experiencing our Christmas Eve service, there are two things I am grateful for: 1) God's gift of Christ and 2) the preschool dept.
Watching "Band of Brothers" with my boys. Great history lesson.
Eating at Zorba's with Tori and Caleb. The kids are trying new cuisines with mom gone today and tomorrow.
Made a large batch of tabouli today. Enjoying it now. Yum!
